author: Bret Bunker
comment: I love the ability to send messages without taking my phone out our having to talk. I was having trouble getting the message to send as the send icon was on the edge of the screen where my watch face is not as responsive. The developer was quick to respond and let me know I could send  simply holding the message window, which works perfectly. I have the Moto 360  2nd Gen and am using the  FlickKey keyboard.
title: Works Great!

author: Crystalina Guo
comment: I really like the ability to answer directly from the watch with this app. However, I have been comparing it to my default messaging app, and I noticed how this app only allows you to see the last message received. Also, there is no quick shortcut to view the entire conversation after getting a notification. Adding those features would make this the perfect messenger app! Could these be added? Thanks!
title: Great app but could improve

author: Patrick Jennings
comment: I wish the voice dictation auto capitalized the beginning of sentences, and that the delete key had a bigger hit box. Like I said it only needs a few more things. It looks beautiful on my Lg G Watch though.
title: Just a few more things

author: Dustin Nunes
comment: Just got it and have been using it for about a day now. Love it. I do wish when you dismiss a text on the watch the notification would go away on the phone but not a big deal. Other than that, works great. No crashes, bugs or glitches so far. Reason I didn't give it a 5 is because it doesn't let you personalize quick replies for certain contacts.  Again not a huge deal but something that would definitely be really usefull. Would say this app and coffee when it comes back will definitely be the 2 to beat

author: Russ M
comment: My only complaint is, when you enter the text conversation the most recent texts are listed at the bottom... There should be a way to change the order so the newest parts of the message thread are at the top

author: Chris L
comment: Like the app. Wish it would show a picture of the MMS sent like my prior app. Group messages show up as a MMS but u don't know if someone sent a pix or it's a group message  Update if someone sends u multiple texts rapid fire u usually don't get the first one. It's like the second takes over. Can u if this? Didn't have this issue with textra. Really becoming an issue. Only see second of 2 texts from person if both sent back to back. This and MMS view would raisenit to 5 stars.

author: Shekita Everett
comment: I have a note 7 and a LG Urbane and I can't get my messages to my watch. I have emailed the developer 3 days ago but he haven't responsed, so can anyone help with suggestions or can I get a refund.  Thanks so much
title: No notification to watch

author: Michael G
comment: What an outstanding application.  The voice to text features built into the factory system are great and all, but there are so many times when silence is golden and texting is most advantageous.  Plus being able to go back into conversations is very nice. Well done. 6/28/2016 update. There have been some changes to the app which I am pleased to say has made it even better. One of the very few apps that actually improves with updates.
title: Excellent

author: Philippe Babin
comment: I have a lg g watch urbane and I can't send or read any conversations if the app isn't open on the phone
title: Problem with the app

author: Tyler Argyle
comment: Note: the flickkey keyboard is no longer available. Pros: -Lots of keyboard options, gives you the capability to send actual messages off your watch without dictation or canned responses. -Quickly pushes messages to your watch, I have had Wear Messaging apps in the past that took several minutes to refresh. -Opens to a dialer so you can also make calls or send messages to numbers not in your phonebook. -Many customizations for notifications -Enforce mode allows it to work with unsupported SMS clients  Cons: -Lack of support from Flickkey, as mentioned above -No MMS support- which means no group messaging either -QWERTY keyboards are larger than watch screen, requiring you to scroll back and forth, made up for by smaller available keyboards.  Used on Huawei Watch  Will update here if either developer responds.

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: Sorry Tyler, I just missed your email. I just responded you with all the informations you requested.

author: Mike Strange
comment: Major improvements made since I purchased this app last year. This provided a way to silently text on my Huawei watch before wear 2.0 was even being thought of. Once in a while I still have syncing issues but overall this app is great!

author: Daniel Zambrano
comment: Not sure if it is the developers fault but this apps touch interface is quirky. I suppose if you I really took a few weeks to drill through a ton of messages it could work for me, but the idea of an app is to make life easier not give you something to work on. I give it 2 starts for a valient effort, as I suspect the issue has more to do with the relatively new android wear platform os. This may work for someone with small fingers, and a chunk of time to train. Asked for a refund and havent heard back.
title: Quirky

author: Sarah Pedias
comment: I purchased this app by mistake I thought this app had mms capability. I requested refund right away. Developer would not refund!!!! This app is useless with no mms capability!!!!

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: The user forgot to mention she bought the app, got a refund, then bought the app again. Apps can be refunded only once.

author: MILES MILLER
comment: Stopped sending SMS....the only thing it's supposed to do.  Emailed dev....no answer.  Wish I could get a refund

author: Honza Pavelka
comment: Its cool app, but... When i send message from my watch (asus zenwatch 2), it doesnt sync what i wrote. It doesnt appear on my phone, also not on my watch.

author: Antoine Brounsuzian
comment: I'm not kidding you all.... This by far is the most superior messaging app for wear I've used this far. Pay the $2.50 it's more than worth it. Appearance is out of this world, functionality is exactly what I was looking for. You can use any messaging app on your phone but they come through this app on the watch and also you can see up to 20 messages per conversation. I love it.

author: Sonny Pham
comment: I'm sure it's been brought up, but can you please make it so that if we check the message on our watch with this app, that the message is marked as read on the default SMS app on our device as well? I always open my phone to see messages that I've checked long ago on this app to still remain in the notification shade.

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: please enable notification linking in wear messenger

title: Connect this to the default SMS app of the device

author: Eric Boring
comment: This app is fantastic! The best messenger for wear. I often have group text conversations with my co-workers. I will give 5 starts if you add the ability to read and reply to group messages on the watch.
title: Good but need MMS

author: roach182008
comment: I got the new s7 and now wear messenger won't even pop up on my lg g watch r? Why Re: thank you I followed instruction from a previous reply on another review and it worked thank you

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: Awesome, glad everything is back in working order. Any other reason for the 3 stars? We're here to help :-)

title: It use to work

author: Dustin Haefele
comment: It may be just message length but some messages only the last sentence comes through... Other than when that happens I like the app.

author: TaJuan Jordan
comment: Love it! I can use my emojis with the quick reply option, use predefined messages that I control, or use a keyboard to reply. This covers everything.

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: v2.6.7 is out! Hangouts 4.0 is now supported. Enjoy!

title: Great App

author: H. H.C
comment: Can't use my internal Sim card in LG Urbane 2nd, defeats the purpose really

author: Casra Kiani
comment: Bought the full version because it's honestly the best client for Android wear. Just really need MMS support and then this'll be the best/get the fifth star.
title: Gets the job done

author: Irene Carter
comment: Will not install on my fossil gen3 smart watch. Tried lots of times

author: Marcus Canady
comment: Don't show alerts on my watch after a couple of days
title: Sync issues

author: Anthony Scorzo
comment: Love the app, t9 is my favorite. Perfect for a small watch face. Adding words is very simple to do too. Best messaging app out there!

reply.author: Dream Code
reply.content: hello! you can switch words using the asterisk button :)

title: Great app t9 works flawlessly

author: hayley r
comment: Terrible!!! Paid for this and everything doesnt even work need a refund asap

author: Ettercap
comment: I can't seem to get it to link to conversations within the Text Now app which is what I'm primarily wanting to use it for.
title: Any way to work with Text Now?

author: Shakilla W
comment: I like it better than when I first downloaded it last year. But now my issue is where are the emojis?

author: Manish Sehgal
comment: The embedded keyboard isn't great. Flick key is better.
title: Better with FlickKey

author: Joe Kelly
comment: Great app but why are all my contact duplicated like 5 times each? Otherwise a solid app and use it everyday !
title: Great!

author: Roberto Cabrera
comment: I chose the sound notifications and no sound is coming out. Please fix for next update
title: Needs improvement

author: Jay Slay
comment: Overall it does what it says but I purchased the app thinking that I can view and send message can this pleased be updated to include that feature

author: Cody DOrazio
comment: When I read messages on my phone they don't disappear on my watch. And when I reply from my phone it also won't disappear. Please fix!
title: Needs some work

author: Nick Giarraputo
comment: Only wish you could change the background on the watch, not a fan of the default one
title: So convenient and useful

author: Michael Olaworetan
comment: It won't even let me look at older messages.

author: Anne Tait
comment: Drained watch too too fast. Deleted in same day I bought it.

author: Skyler Tanaka
comment: Easy and works perfectly, just as described!
title: Awesome App!

author: Michael Person
comment: Works great

author: Angelo de la Rosa
comment: Please integrate with with EvolveSMS!
title: Moto360 integration
